scripts.dev: npm run dev:kill && concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev:server:log" "npm run dev:web:log"
scripts.dev:server:log: npm run dev:kill:3001 && npm run dev:server 2>&1 | tee tmp/server.log
scripts.dev:web:log: npm run dev:kill:3000 && npm run dev:web 2>&1 | tee tmp/web.log
scripts.typecheck: npx tsc --noEmit --project apps/server/tsconfig.json && npx tsc --noEmit --project apps/web/tsconfig.json
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run knip
